Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Hamlin
ShortDescription: #76 Diversey buses are rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Center Park, Fullerton, Pulaski and Diversey, due to police activity near Diversey/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Center Park, Fullerton, Pulaski, then resume their normal route on Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to police activity near Diversey/Hamlin.

Headline: Forest Park-Bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero (Congress)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero (Congress) due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero (Congress) due to a door problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
